entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow over western sections early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
